Reviews.Title: Just because the price is lower does not mean a lower quality machine!
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: Incredible! I have owned several quality laptops and after heavy debate I decided to see what this Toshiba could do. I am pleased beyond compare.... twice, no, three times the machine I expected. great design, keyboard, mouse, features etc etc. I had a machine that I paid twice the price for and I lived with the glitches, poor design and battery life for 3 years before purchasing this laptop. Fortunately, my older machine was dropped breaking the display and now I get to enjoy this new laptop. If looking for a quality computer at a very affordable price you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: lots of bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: matthew morris
Reviews.Content: it works great. windows 8 takes some getting used to but it works good. it doesn't have backlit keys so if you compute in the dark you need a light. its a beast of a computer in the price range its in.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: VolFam
Reviews.Content: love this laptop it is a great computer to use in my college classes and a great price for a college budget.

Reviews.Title: Mouse action is hesitating, too much junkware
Reviews.Author: Shurin Mtellnya "River Rat"
Reviews.Content: Not sure where to differentiate between Windows 8 and the Toshiba Laptop.  The mouse is sticky sometimes or you can't even see it on the screen.  Toshiba loads it up with a lot of unnecessary bloatware.  With four gigs of memory I was always crashing Chrome, until I deleted all the preloaded junkware.I have ordered more memory for it, that may help.  Would not order this machine without at least 8 gigs of memory.Price was pretty good, but i would not recommend this to anyone, too hard to make it run like it should.

Reviews.Title: satellite connection is great!
Reviews.Author: P. McAuley
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Toshiba brand after having an HP for several years.  This laptop has a terrific connection to the internet.  Windows 8 takes some time getting used to it but it's not as difficult as some people say.  The computer is very lightweight and portable.  The speakers could be better but, all in all, it's a pretty good computer for the money.

Reviews.Title: $229 at BEST BUY
Reviews.Author: Dodie's Doodles
Reviews.Content: $229 at BEST BUY. So, that's over a $100 cheaper. I have a Toshiba Satellite. It runs pretty good, though the sound quality is not as great as I would like. Had very few problems until I dropped it. That's not the computer's fault. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great for the average computer user
Reviews.Author: Dakota Ryan
Reviews.Content: This laptop works great for what it is.  It's not designed for lots of fancy graphics editing or video editing or amazing game play it designed to do all of a computers basic functions efficiently. ( type, Internet , music, videos etc.). I would recommend and USB external drive with this unit to keep the interal hard drive free of clutter because after you put about 250gigs on unit it becomes VERY slow.  But it you use and external drive it functions perfectly.  This unit was priced at 220$ when I purchased it and still can't believe it works as well as it does.  One thing that is really terrible is the internal speakers. They barely get loud enough to hear in a quite room but simply fixed with a wireless or wired set of speakers.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Ashes
Reviews.Content: Not bad for the price . . . . Takes some time to get used too software. Other than that I'm happy to have a computer that works

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop!
Reviews.Author: Lynne
Reviews.Content: There was an issue with delivery (they sent the wrong one and intercepted it just before delivery, then shipped out the correct one).  This caused a 5 day delay, but it wasn't a big deal.The computer itself, its great.  Lightweight, took less than 5 mins to register and get up and running.  Windows 8 is a pain in the butt to get used to, but I will adjust.  It's quick and has a good battery life.  It was a great bargain for the price!

Reviews.Title: Terrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Mike Bass
Reviews.Content: They outsource their customer service to India.The computer started to have issues with the cooling system while under warranty. I called and was told they would help me back up some expensive software I had on the computer. They never said they would charge me for help backing up the computer before sending it in. Luckily, I asked if there would be a charge and they finally admitted there would be.  I was then told I would be charged $25  to send in the computer even though the cooling system is a known hardware issue with their computers. I called and was told by customer service that shipping was free - on the return trip back. I had to pay the $25 and there was nothing they would do. Their customer service was not only useless, but also was consistently misleading.Next time I will buy from a company that stands behind its products - like HP or Dell.

Reviews.Title: Love hate relationship.
Reviews.Author: Brenda Williams "brenbb"
Reviews.Content: The Laptop is O.K.  the good thing about it, if you do not use for about five minutes, it shuts off, that's energy saver power, however, it takes forever to power up, once you turn it on, it takes up to 10-15 minutes to power up. That's what I hate about it.

Reviews.Title: Great pc, based in the price I would say ...
Reviews.Author: Alonso
Reviews.Content: Great pc, based in the price I would say this is a good choice since it comes with the basic requirements for people that doesn't need high processor tasks or applications.

Reviews.Title: Bad support, poor design
Reviews.Author: Dre
Reviews.Content: 6 month after purchase, the left hinge of the screen broke.  The metal snapped into two pieces because the hinge handle has a hole drilled though it, and it cracked right next to the hole.This was during normal use, it broke as the laptop was being opened.I contacted Toshiba, but they say it is not covered because it's physical damage.  I'm highly disappointed in Toshiba's service.  This should be covered by the warranty, even when I read the warranty details, it states it should be covered, but they will not.The hinge should have been better designed in the first place, seems a lot of people have issues with Toshiba satellite hinges breaking.

Reviews.Title: What Should be expected to come with a laptop
Reviews.Author: jonathan Southard
Reviews.Content: That when you get your laptop it should come with a manual which it did not, and any and all information referring to the product. Also why are all these laptops geared with Norton anti-virus when so many others are out there to choose from.

Reviews.Title: windows 8 bites
Reviews.Author: benjamin marks
Reviews.Content: windows 8 bites the big one stick with windows 7 to remain stress freei dont know what else to say

Reviews.Title: Packing box had been opened.
Reviews.Author: Marlene Duncan
Reviews.Content: The computer would not boot up!  Also an "Inspected by Best Buy" sticker was on the laptop.  Who knows why?
